about_the_game:
Reboot Heroes combines the auto-battle combat of Backpack Battles with the strategic deckbuilding of Slay the Spire, and the team-building adventure of Final Fantasy.

  • Build Your Team: Each run starts with one hero, you recruit 2 others by defeating them.
  • Unique Heroes: Each hero has their own 100+ cards, not shared between Heroes!
  • Powerful Elements: Combine elements to channel the powers of Wind, Darkness, Chaos and more.
  • Hero Stats: Your Heroes grow in power as the game progresses, with a versatile stat system.
  • Rewarding Creativity: Each run is unique, and discourages seeing the same builds over and over.
  • Combine Strategies: Will your warrior be a Berserker, Samurai, Dark Knight or a mix between all?
  • Endless Replayability: The scaling ranked mode is a challenge for even the best players.


Your team fights by executing your pre-planned timelines during combat. Carefully plan each characters actions by placing cards in one of their 5 chip-slots, then test your build against the world.


Each character has their own unique cards and strategies, what matter most, is how you combine them to create a strong team.

In addition, each card has at least two 'elements' which are powerful team-wide effects that trigger when you have at least 3 of the same element equipped.


The world changes as you travel through it and remembers your run. Dialogue adapts and characters remember you. Together you must uncover why the world has fallen, and what you can do to fix it.
